entry.title: Rule Number One: Don't Fall in Love With Your Best Friend's Brother
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 84,281Chapters: 17/30Kudos: 398

Summary: Stiles absolutely, most definitely, totally does NOT have a crush on Derek Hale. Not at all. He doesn't.He grew up with the Hale kids and saw every embarrassing moment along the way. How could he have a crush on someone he saw cry the first time they saw their beta shift in the mirror? Someone he saw literally almost bite off their own finger while eating. No. No, Stiles definitely doesn't think about his best friend's older brother like that.What happens when the opportunity to confront his totally-not-a-crush appears: the Beacon Hills high school's Valentine's Day fundraiser.Also known as 50/50 slice of life/teen wolf drama with a hearty dose of the Hales being a close knit family

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,209Chapters: 32/75Kudos: 33

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: Fighting for Hope
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,789Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 47

Summary: Stiles Stilinski, a bright young police man in training, travels to Europe with his Dad.There he suffers a terrible tragedy: Getting deported into sexual slavery.Being sold as an "American Virgin Boy Nr. 14", it appears to be his fate to provide sexual services to any customer.But one strange customer might just be his chance for freedom. Derek Hale comes from a wealthy family, defies the criminal system he was born into and tries to rescue two little girls from being trafficked.After spending years in a private prison, he finally breaks free and resumes his life's work. And he is out to take revenge.What he did not anticipate was falling in love with a guy named Stiles. How will they escape the grasp of an internationally operating slavery syndicate?How will Stiles find trust again? Love and hope despite everything?

entry.title: Back Home
entry.summary:
Author: thinkingaboutelephants

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,441Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 83

Summary: Derek was on the other side of his twenties now, but one glimpse of him from across the yard proved that he still had the same allure that had pulled at Stiles before he left for college, maybe since he stood across from him in the preserve and was told to get off his property.He wasn’t alone.Eli hid behind his legs. He’d grown, his head full of dark curls half poking out and resting on his dad’s thigh, wide eyes the same pale green. entry.title: the boy who cried hunter
entry.summary:
Author: fried_extracrispy_trenchcoat

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,019Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 6

Summary: "Why did you believe me?" Stiles asks later, catching up to Derek outside the police station. He's back to his scowly, bristly self."Because you're right, it is arson. But the police can't prove who did it."I know who it is, Stiles thinks, watching him leave in a sleek black Camaro. But how is he supposed to tell Derek without making himself look totally suspicious? The thing about arson is one thing, but claiming to know who the arsonist was when the whole town was convinced it was faulty wiring?And he had no evidence. While evidence doesn’t always mean truth, evidence does get a person places. Case in point: evidence would get a mass murderer like Kate Argent in prison for life.

entry.title: Demon on His Shoulders
entry.summary:
Author: Mekanamin02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,605Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 73

Summary: Loner demon lord, Derek Hale just wants a quiet day to himself. One day, is all he asks. But one moment he's at home and the next he's standing in front of a frail old lady jumping to make a demon deal with him. He REALLY doesn't want to accept the deal but... circumstances. So now he's inserting himself into the life of a certain Stiles Stilinski to play his part but perhaps this will be a deal of Derek's millennia-long existence that he will never forget.~*~An unstoppable scream wrenches its way out of the demon as the feeling overpowers every sense in his body. He knows he’s gripping the woman’s arm too tightly, but he can’t seem to care when it feels like his core is igniting from within.Somewhere on the other side of the county, a boy gasps awake beside a hospital bed. There’s beeping behind him, loud, counting down. He sighs and stands, rolls his heavy shoulders and got to work, not realising he has a demon riding on his shoulders now. A demon his grandmother traded her life to protect him.
